title: Enchanted Amethyst Floral Jhumka Earrings
materials: Round Brilliant Cut Diamonds (Color Grade F
features: These stunning Jhumkas reimagine the classic silhouette with a contemporary floral cascade design. Each earring features a large floral motif at the top, fully encrusted with brilliant cut diamonds. The amethyst stones, in varying shades of purple, are meticulously set in a gradient arrangement to create a captivating color transition. The overall design evokes a sense of understated elegance and sophistication. Features a secure post and clip closure.
occasions: and special occasions where you want to add a touch of contemporary glamour to your look.
description: These Amethyst Floral Jhumkas offer a modern twist on a classic design. The vibrant amethysts, combined with the sparkle of diamonds set in white gold, create a truly eye-catching statement. The unique floral cascade design is sure to turn heads and add a touch of sophistication to any outfit. They represent a blend of refined style and craftsmanship.
